uhc.commands.error.noTeam: You can only run this command if you are alive and in a team!
uhc.advancements.root.desc: Advancements to achieve during the UHC!
uhc.advancements.firstBlood.desc: Kill the first person of the game
uhc.advancements.earlyExit.desc: Someone had to go out first ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
uhc.advancements.mostlyHarmless.desc: Lest damage dealt to other players
uhc.advancements.heavyHitter.desc: Most damage dealt to other players
uhc.advancements.combatLogger.desc: We all believe it was your internet...
uhc.advancements.parkourMaster.desc: Complete the parkour in the lobby
uhc.advancements.worldRecordPace.desc: Be the first to craft a crafting table
uhc.advancements.thatsEmbarrassing.desc: Take damage from a sweet berry bush
uhc.advancements.busted.desc: Break the rules by using flexible block placement
uhc.advancements.demolitionExpert.desc: Are you sure you know what you're doing with that?
uhc.advancements.brokenAnkles.desc: Take fall damage within a minute of UHC starting
uhc.advancements.onTheEdge.desc: Surviving 60 seconds on half a heart
uhc.advancements.notNow.desc: Sensei's words echoed... There's a time and a place for everything, but not now.
uhc.advancements.officiallyBored.desc: Beat Minesweeper in less than 40 seconds
uhc.advancements.findTheButton.desc: Follow the clues in the lobby to find the button
uhc.advancements.uhOh.desc: Oops, I forgot to add barriers!
uhc.advancements.teamPlayer.desc: Abandon your team and return after they are eliminated
uhc.advancements.bearCared.desc: Get absolutely obliterated by a warden
uhc.broadcast.hostedBy: Thanks KiwiTech for hosting the UHC server!
uhc.broadcast.borderWarning: Remember to keep an eye on your distance to the border!
uhc.broadcast.spectator:
While you are spectating don't spoil information to your team or chat!
You can join the spectator VC to talk about the game
uhc.broadcast.noPotions: You cannot craft instant healing potions or level 2 potions
uhc.broadcast.globalChat: By default you will be talking in team chat, to talk in global chat prefix your message with '!'
uhc.broadcast.nightVision: You can enable or disable nightvision with /fullbright
uhc.broadcast.teamGlow: You can enable or disable team glowing with /teamglow
uhc.broadcast.rules: Please familiarise yourself with the rules in the #uhc-rules discord channel!
uhc.broadcast.specCommand: In spectator mode you can use the /spectate command to be able to teleport to other players
uhc.broadcast.playerHeads:
When a player dies they will drop their head, you can consume this for some buffs.
You can enhance the buffs by surrounding it in gold ingots in a crafting table
uhc.broadcast.joke: Hello World. Testing... Foobar. // TODO: remove this message before starting UHC
uhc.broadcast.pos: You can broadcast your position to your team with the /pos command, teammates can then click the coordinates to look in your direction
uhc.broadcast.outsideBorder: When you are outside the border an arrow will guide you back to safety. The world border will invert, allowing you to break and place blocks
